1128460.name: Gods of Havoc: Into the Void - Rise of the AI
1128460.description:
Mastered the art of defeating other gods?
Wondered about the strange robot intelligences, which only seems to exist to be assimilated?

It's time for a new challenge, and to get some answers!

Rise of the AI offers a new challenge to 'Gods of Havoc: Into the Void' by creating a deadly and clever robot opponent. This DLC is only suggested for those who are looking for a serious challenge!

  • Robots have unique structures and ships;
  • A unique playstyle which tries to assimilate or destroy all life;
  • New ships;
  • Subjigate and convert them to your will and unleash their power's against the other gods..
  • Battle against them, and the standard gods, on more spacious maps which allow for differing play styles.
1128460.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
